meanings.definition: Having or showing a strong desire and determination to succeed.
meanings.sent1: She is very ambitious and works hard to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent2: The young entrepreneur had ambitious plans to expand her business globally.
meanings.sent3: His ambitious nature led him to attempt climbing the highest mountain in the world.
meanings.sent4: Her ambitious spirit soared like a kite in the sky, reaching new heights.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious student's drive to excel shone brightly in the classroom.

meanings.sent1: The project was ambitious and demanded a lot of time and skill.
meanings.sent2: The ambitious task of building a house from scratch was challenging.
meanings.sent3: It was ambitious of him to try and bake a three-tiered cake for the first time.
meanings.sent4: Her ambitious attempt to run a marathon without training was like a leap of faith.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious goal of completing the puzzle in one hour pushed her limits.

meanings.sent1: The ambitious student dreamed of becoming a doctor and helping others.
meanings.sent2: She set ambitious targets for her savings to buy a new car.
meanings.sent3: His ambitious goal of reading 50 books in a year was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her ambitious dreams reached for the stars, aiming for the impossible.
meanings.sent5: The ambitious plan to travel the world was the ultimate adventure for them.
